entities.name: umbrella stand
entities.description: The umbrella stand is mentioned as a cause of tripping over. It is described as 'stupid'.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: Harry is the protagonist who trips over the umbrella stand and sees the life-size portrait.

entities.name: old woman
entities.description: The old woman is depicted in a life-size portrait as screaming and being tortured. She is wearing a black cap.

relationships.description: Harry tripped over the umbrella stand.
Harry saw the old woman in the life-size portrait screaming.
The old woman was depicted in a life-size portrait.
The portraits were located along the hall behind Harry.
